name: fundamental-ngx
description: Fundamental Library for Angular is a themable Fiori Angular component library.

scripts.build-all: yarn run build-artifacts && yarn run build-docs -- --configuration production --base-href="/fundamental-ngx/"
scripts.build-docs: yarn run compile-typedoc-all && yarn run copy-docs && ng build
scripts.build-artifacts: nx build i18n --configuration production && nx build core --configuration production && nx build platform --configuration production && nx build moment-adapter --configuration production && nx build datetime-adapter --configuration production && nx build fn --configuration production && nx build docs
scripts.build-deploy-library: nx build i18n --configuration production && nx build core --configuration production && nx build platform --configuration production && nx build moment-adapter --configuration production && nx build datetime-adapter --configuration production && nx build fn --configuration production && yarn run build:schematics && yarn run build:platform-schematics && yarn run build:moment-adapter-schematics && yarn run sync-versions && cp PLATFORM_README.md dist/libs/platform/PLATFORM_README.md
scripts.build-pack-library: nx build i18n --configuration production && nx build core --configuration production && nx build platform --configuration production && nx build moment-adapter --configuration production && nx build datetime-adapter --configuration production && nx build fn --configuration production && yarn run build:schematics && yarn run build:platform-schematics && yarn run build:moment-adapter-schematics && yarn run sync-versions && cd dist/libs/core/ && yarn pack && cd ../platform && yarn pack && cd ../moment-adapter && yarn pack && cd ../..
scripts.copy-docs: cp README.md apps/docs/src/assets/README.md && cp NEW_COMPONENT.md apps/docs/src/assets/NEW_COMPONENT.md && yarn run copy-app-docs
scripts.copy-app-docs: cp libs/core/src/lib/README.md apps/docs/src/assets/CORE_README.md && cp PLATFORM_README.md apps/docs/src/assets/PLATFORM_README.md
scripts.e2e:ci: ng serve --watch false & wait-on http://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:wdio
scripts.e2e:platform:ci: ng serve --watch false --configuration production & wait-on http://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:wdio:platform
scripts.e2e:core:ci: ng serve --watch false --configuration production & wait-on http://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:wdio:core
scripts.e2e:cron:platformA:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --watch false --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:platformA
scripts.e2e:cron:platformB:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --watch false --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:platformB
scripts.e2e:cron:platformC:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --watch false --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:platformC
scripts.e2e:cron:coreA:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --watch false --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:coreA
scripts.e2e:cron:coreB:ci: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --watch false --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 && yarn run e2e:cron:wdio:saucelabs:coreB
scripts.e2e:a11y: ng serve --disable-host-check --ssl --watch false --configuration production & wait-on https://localhost:4200 &&  yarn run e2e:wdio:a11y
scripts.lint: yarn run lint:docs && yarn run lint:core && yarn run lint:platform && yarn run lint:moment-adapter && yarn run lint:datetime-adapter && yarn run lint:fn && npm run lint:i18n
scripts.lint:pre-commit:
printf "running pre-commit lint..."  && yarn run lint && printf "done!
"
scripts.compile-typedoc-all: yarn run compile-typedoc-core && yarn run compile-typedoc-platform && yarn run compile-typedoc-moment-adapter && yarn run compile-typedoc-i18n-json && npm run transform-typedocs
scripts.compile-typedoc-core: rm -rf apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/core && typedoc --out apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/core libs/core/src/lib --tsconfig libs/core/src/lib/tsconfig.lib.json --hideGenerator --theme apps/docs/src/fd-typedoc
scripts.compile-typedoc-platform: rm -rf apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/platform && typedoc --out apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/platform libs/platform/src/lib --tsconfig libs/platform/src/lib/tsconfig.lib.json --hideGenerator --theme apps/docs/src/fd-typedoc
scripts.build:schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p libs/core/tsconfig.schematics.json && yarn run copy:schemas && yarn run copy:collection
scripts.build:platform-schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p libs/platform/tsconfig.schematics.json && yarn run copy:platform-add-schemas && yarn run copy:platform-collection
scripts.build:moment-adapter-schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p libs/moment-adapter/tsconfig.schematics.json && yarn run copy:moment-adapter-add-schemas && yarn run copy:moment-adapter-add-collection
scripts.postinstall: node ./decorate-angular-cli.js && ngcc --properties es2020 browser module main
scripts.docker-test: docker run -u $(id -u) --rm -v "$PWD":/app trion/ng-cli-karma yarn run test
